name: CDN Enabler Replace Content
author: Jundell Agbo

sections.description:
This plugin requires CDN ENABLER plugin allows you to replace multiple contents and having full control to rewrite your content to your cdn.

This is NOT an official addon to CDN Enabler!

Installation

  • Go to Plugins > Add New > CDN Enabler Replace Content
  • Go to Settings > CDN Enabler Replace Contents

Sample Settings

  • mydomain.com/wp-content/uploads | cdndomain.com/wp-content/uploads
  • mydomain.com\/wp-content\/uploads | cdndomain.com\/wp-content\/uploads

Features

  • Fast and efficient rewrite engine
  • Full control to replace any of your contents

Maintainer

  • Jundell Agbo
sections.changelog:
• Adding License: GPLv2 or later

1.1.0

1.0.0
* First major release
